item.title: Problem Set 3
item.description:
Week 3 Problem Sets

If you study graphs in which edges can link more than two nodes, youre more properly called a hyperedgelord.

CodeForces

  • CodeForces 580C: Kefa and Park
  • CodeForces 1167C: News Distribution
  • CodeForces 1143C: Queen
  • CodeForces 1144F: Graph Without Long Directed Paths

Kattis

  • Class Picture
  • Faulty Robot
  • Breaking Bad

item.title: Problem Set 2
item.description:
Week 2 Problem Sets

This week, I listed CodeForces problems in order of increasing rank (as dictated by CodeForces). This might not be a good indication of difficulty, however We also tried to reduce the number of questions so everyone will have attempted more of the same questions when we discuss.
-Imad

I also suggest starting with Knapsack, from the Kattis section - its pretty vanilla.

CodeForces

  • CodeForces 961B: Lecture Sleep
  • CodeForces 698A: Vacations
  • CodeForces 855B: Marvolo Gaunts Ring
  • CodeForces 573B: Bear and Blocks

Kattis

  • Knapsack
  • Restaurant Orders
  • Longest Increasing Subsequence
  • Spidermans Workout

Sorry... I had to...
